headline: The Bull Case For Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Could Change Following Massive India AI Data Center Push
summary: Recently, Digital Realty Trust revealed a joint venture with Reliance Industries and Brookfield Corporation to invest US$11.00 billion in AI-focused data capacity in Andhra Pradesh, India, alongside a US$373.00 million power equipment supply agreement with Schneider Electric and an expanded AI infrastructure collaboration with NVIDIA in Northern Virginia. Together, these moves suggest Digital Realty is working to secure key power equipment, hyperscale partners, and AI workloads across both...
